item.title: MN-60 East - Nobles County
item.description: MN-60 East in Nobles County, just north of the Iowa-Minnesota State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Minnesota - MN-60 East
item.description: Welcome To Minnesota on MN-60 East. Taken at the Iowa-Minnesota line. 340th St. where this picture is taken runs along the state line.

item.title: US-59 South/MN-60 West Split
item.description: US-59 South/MN-60 West split in Nobles County. Turn left for US-59 South to Cherokee (IA); continue straight on MN-60 West to Sioux City (IA).

item.title: US-59 South/MN-60 West Approaching US-59/MN-60 Split
item.description: US-59 South/MN-60 West approaching US-59/MN-60 split in Nobles County. Use left lane for US-59 south. MN-60 continues west on divided highway.

item.title: US-59 South/BL-90 West at MN-60/CH-33 - Roundabout
item.description: US-59 South/BL-90 West at MN-60/CH-33 roundabout in Worthington. US-59 South joins MN-60 Westbound. BL-90 East joins MN-60 Eastbound.

item.title: US-59 South/BL-90 East Approaching MN-60
item.description: US-59 South/BL-90 East approaching MN-60 roundabout.

item.title: US-59 South at BL-90/To MN-60
item.description: US-59 South (Humiston Ave.) at BL-90/To MN-60 (Oxford St.). Turn left on Oxford St. to continue south on US-59 South and to MN-60. Continue straight for Downtown (Worthington).

item.title: Ryan Road at US-59
item.description: Ryan Road at US-59 (Humiston Ave.) in Worthington.

item.title: BL-90 West/US-59 North - Worthington
item.description: BL-90 West/US-59 North/To I-90 in Worthington

item.title: MN-60 West at US-59 and CH-33
item.description: MN-60 West at US-59 and CH-33 roundabout in Worthington. US-59 South joins MN-60 westbound.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 45 Offramp at BL-90/MN-60 Roundabout
item.description: I-90 East - Exit 45 offramp at BL-90/MN-60 roundabout in Worthington. Use right lane for MN-60 West/(BL-90 West); left lane for MN-60 East.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 45 Offramp at MN-60/BL-90 Roundabout
item.description: I-90 East - Exit 45 Offramp at MN-60/BL-90 roundabout. Use BL-90 West/MN-60 South to Worthington; MN-60 north to Windom.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 45
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 45 - MN-60/Windom. This is the eastern end of the Worthington business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 43
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 43 - US-59/Slayton/Worthington

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 42
item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 42 - BL-90/CH-25. This is the west end of the Worthington business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Worthington Exits
item.description: Exits to Worthington on I-90 East. BL-90/CH-25, US-59, and MN-60.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 33
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 33 - CH-13/Wilmont/Rushmore.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 26 - MN-91/Lake Wilson/Adrian.

item.title: I-90 East - Nobles County
item.description: Nobels County on I-90 East.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 18
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 18 - CH-3/Magnolia/Kanaranzi.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-90 east. Distance to Magnolia, Worthington, and Albert Lea.

item.title: US-75 South at I-90 East - Freeway Entrance
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 East (Exit 12) - Freeway Entrance

item.title: US-75 South at I-90 East
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 East to Worthington.

item.title: US-75 South at I-90
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 (Exit 12) in Luverne.

item.title: US-75 South Approaching I-90
item.description: US-75 South approaching I-90 in Luverne. Use I-90 west to Sioux Falls (South Dakota); I-90 east to Worthington.

item.title: US-75 South at Rock County 4 / Main St
item.description: US-75 South at Rock County 4 / Main St in Luverne. Turn left on Main St./CH-4 for Downtown (Luverne).

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone. The Highway 75 King of Trails Scenic Byway marker is also posted on this sign assembly.

item.title: US-75 South - Rock County
item.description: Rock County on US-75 South. Rock County is in the southwestern corner of Minnesota.

item.title: US-75 South at County Highway 2
item.description: US-75 South at Pipestone CH-2

item.title: US-75 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-75 south. Distance to Trosky and Luverne.

item.title: US-75 South - Pipestone
item.description: US-75 South - Highway 75 King of Trails Scenic Byway and Prairie Passage Route.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East Approaching US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East approaching US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone. Use US-75 South for Luverne; MN-30 East for Slayton.

item.title: MN-30 East/US-75 South Approaching MN-30/US-75 Split
item.description: MN-30 East/US-75 South approaching MN-30/US-75 Split in Pipestone. Use left lane for MN-30 East; right lane for US-75 South.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75 in Pipestone. Turn left for US-75 North/MN-23 North. Continue straight for MN-30 East/US-75 South. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North Approaching US-75/MN-23 North
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North approaching US-75/MN-23 North in Pipestone. Use US-75/MN-23 North for Marshall and Lake Benton. Use US-75 South/MN-30 East for Slayton and Luverne. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-23 North at MN-30
item.description: MN-23 North at MN-30 in Pipestone. MN-23 north joins MN-30 east through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East Approaching MN-23
item.description: MN-30 East Approaching MN-23 South. MN-23 joins MN-30 through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 - Pipestone
item.description: MN-30 East in Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone
item.description: Entering Pipestone on MN-30 east. Pipestone is the count seat of Pipestone County.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone County
item.description: MN-30 East - Pipestone County. At the South Dakota-Minnesota State Line.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone County
item.description: MN-30 East - Pipestone County. At the South Dakota-Minnesota State Line.
